All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Card
It's a class that represents a card in a deck of cards
Client
A Client object is a representation of a client that is connected to the server
ClientApp
It creates a socket, connects to the server, and then creates a thread to read messages from the server and a loop to read messages from the user and send them to the server
ClientRecieveMsgThread
This class reads a line from the server and prints it to the console
ClientThread
This class is a thread that handles a client connection.
GameRunner
A class that runs the game of hearts.
ListLobbies
This class is used to list all the lobbies that are currently available
Lobby
It creates a lobby that will use GameRunner Class to run the game, when the lobby is full.
LobbyHandlerThread
This class is a thread that handles the lobbies.
MessageHandler
This class is responsible for handling messages
Player
It creates a class called Player, that represents a player in the game of hearts.
Server
It creates a server that listens for connections on port 1000.
ServerReadInput
This class is a thread that reads input from the server and handles the commands
Test
Test class for testing particular classes.
TurnRules
The `TurnRules` class is a collection of rules that determine rules for each of the turns in game of hearts.
VirtualDealer
The VirtualDealer class is a class that represents a card dealer in a game of hearts.
